coverages.name: Business Equipment Rental Coverage
coverages.description: Covers the reasonable costs of renting replacement business equipment if yours has been lost, stolen, damaged or delayed by your common carrier.

coverages.name: 24-Hr Hotline Assistance
coverages.description: With Allianz Global Assistance, you'll never travel alone. Our multilingual assistance team is available 24 hours a day to help you handle all kinds of travel emergencies. We can help you find local medical and legal professionals, arrange to send a message home, help with missed connections and lost/stolen travel documents, and much more.

coverages.name: Travel Accident Coverage
coverages.description: Provides cash payment for covered losses due to death, loss of limb(s) or sight as a result of a covered travel accident.

coverages.name: Trip Interruption
coverages.description: Reimburses you for the unused, non-refundable portion of your trip and for the increased transportation costs it takes for you to return home due to a covered reason.

coverages.name: Emergency Medical Transportation
coverages.description: Provides medically necessary transportation to the nearest hospital or appropriate facility following a covered illness or injury.

coverages.name: Travel Delay
coverages.description: Reimburses you for additional expenses due to a covered delay of six hours or more.  Some plans may also cover lost prepaid trip expenses due to covered travel delay, depending on the product and state.  Please see your insuring agreement to verify whether your insurance plan includes this coverage.

coverages.name: Emergency Medical/Dental
coverages.description: Provides benefits for losses due to covered medical and dental emergencies that occur during your trip. Depending on your plan, there is a $500 or $750 maximum for all covered dental expenses.

coverages.name: Concierge
coverages.description: Provides personalized information about your destination and assists you with obtaining restaurant reservations, tee times and tickets to events.

coverages.name: Trip Cancellation
coverages.description: Reimburses your prepaid, non-refundable expenses if you must cancel your trip due to a covered reason.

coverages.name: Business Equipment Coverage
coverages.description: Covers the reasonable replacement or repair of business equipment that has been lost, stolen, damaged or delayed by your common carrier.

coverages.name: Baggage Loss/Damage
coverages.description: Covers loss, damage or theft of baggage and personal effects.

coverages.name: Baggage Delay
coverages.description: Reimburses the reasonable additional purchase of essential items during your trip if your baggage is delayed or misdirected by a common carrier for 24 hours or more. Receipts for emergency purchases are required.

coverages.name: Change Fee Coverage
coverages.description: Provides reimbursement for fees to change the dates on your airline ticket.

policy.productOfferingDescription: Frequent business travelers are all too familiar with the inconvenience and expense of missed flights, lost bags and canceled trips. The Annual Executive Plan is designed to make business travel frustration-free by providing coverage for trip cancellation and interruption; emergency medical care; lost, stolen or delayed baggage; and even rental car collision/loss damage insurance.

coverages.name: 24-Hr Hotline Assistance Plus
coverages.description: With Allianz Global Assistance, you'll never travel alone. Our multilingual assistance team is available 24 hours a day to help you handle covered travel emergencies. We can help you find local medical and legal professionals, arrange to send a message home, help re-book your flight and/or hotel arrangements, help with missed connections, lost/stolen travel documents, and much more.

coverages.name: Trip Interruption
coverages.description: Reimburses you for the unused, non-refundable portion of your trip and for the increased transportation costs it takes for you to return home due to a covered reason.

coverages.name: Emergency Medical/Dental
coverages.description: Provides benefits for losses due to covered medical and dental emergencies that occur during your trip. Depending on your plan, there is a $500 or $750 maximum for all covered dental expenses.

coverages.name: Emergency Medical Transportation
coverages.description: Provides medically necessary transportation to the nearest hospital or appropriate facility following a covered illness or injury.

coverages.name: Baggage Loss/Damage
coverages.description: Covers loss, damage or theft of baggage and personal effects.

coverages.name: Travel Delay
coverages.description: Reimburses you for additional expenses due to a covered delay of six hours or more.  Some plans may also cover lost prepaid trip expenses due to covered travel delay, depending on the product and state.  Please see your insuring agreement to verify whether your insurance plan includes this coverage.

coverages.name: Frequent Traveler Loyalty Plan
coverages.description: Coverage for frequent flyer mile redeposit fees in the event of a covered trip cancellation.

coverages.name: Baggage Delay
coverages.description: Reimburses the reasonable additional purchase of essential items during your trip if your baggage is delayed or misdirected by a common carrier for 24 hours or more. Receipts for emergency purchases are required.

coverages.name: Change Fee Coverage
coverages.description: Provides reimbursement for fees to change the dates on your airline ticket.

coverages.name: Missed Connection
coverages.description: Reimburses expenses resulting from a covered delay that causes you to miss your scheduled flight or cruise.

coverages.name: Trip Cancellation
coverages.description: Reimburses your prepaid, non-refundable expenses if you must cancel your trip due to a covered reason.

coverages.name: 24-Hr Hotline Assistance
coverages.description: With Allianz Global Assistance, you'll never travel alone. Our multilingual assistance team is available 24 hours a day to help you handle all kinds of travel emergencies. We can help you find local medical and legal professionals, arrange to send a message home, help with missed connections and lost/stolen travel documents, and much more.

coverages.name: Collision Damage Waiver
coverages.description: Covers costs if a car you're renting is stolen or is damaged in an accident or while it's left unattended.

policy.productOfferingDescription: We've created a solution to save you time and money at the car rental counter. Rental Car Damage Protector provides primary coverage for covered collision, loss and damage up to $40,000, along with 24-hour emergency assistance. For only $9 per day you can be covered, and won't ever have to worry about using your personal car insurance company.

coverages.name: Collision Damage Waiver
coverages.description: Covers costs if a car you're renting is stolen or is damaged in an accident or while it's left unattended.

policy.productOfferingDescription: If you're planning an incredible family vacation, you need travel insurance coverage to match.  Classic Plan with Trip+ doubles most of the Classic Plan's post-departure benefits, meaning you get the maximum coverage available. With up to $50,000 in emergency medical coverage and up to $1 million in emergency medical transportation, you know your family's protected. Kids 17 and under are covered free when traveling with a parent or grandparent.
